It's hard to fault this game once you get into it, but it's very hard to get into. Might take a few long breaks before it finally clicks for you. New content doesn't get added very often which is alright, because there is a ton of depth to the skill levels of opponents so the game holds up without constant content updates. There are always things to work on if you want to git gud
